data.text: Ungo, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa ʋaazu eteai pɛ koloɠolosu,
Faa ɠilagi naa nɔ ɠa a ɠa ga
Eteai ɠa ɠoloɠolo mɛtu, suwo kpɛlɛtɛtɛ,
Gɔlɔɗɛi ɠa eteai ɠaazuʋɛ,
Eteai ɠɔzɔni su nuɓusɛiti kɔɠɔwu,
Naa maaʋele ma, eteai ɠana ɠala ga GALA ná-foovooi.
Dɔɔ niinɛi ɠaazuɠilia,
Tamadegiti ta-ɠoozunɛɛi maaleʋea,
Dɔɔ ɓɔle wuye la mɔ loozu,
Taa wolai ʋua ya, naa zuwoga.
Ɛsɛ pɛ ka kpeei loozu koi yɔɠɔzu ʋeleiti su,
Taazuʋɛ zuɠoloɠologa mɛtu,
Ʋele ɠana a ɠɛɛ la nuɓusɛiti saama zooi ɠa,
Niiti ta yɛ vulua ta guyei loo,
Folo ɠulazu ʋelei yooi zu,
Nuiti gooi ɠa ɠulazu zou ɓela ga,
Dualuagi, zeɠei ɓomaʋɛ ta tumɔi,
Zɔi a ʋela dualuagi maalugi ʋa,
Zooi ɠa ʋalizu ga,
É ɗa ziɛ tingotanga eɠɛ dɔɔzo nui,
Naama volo ná, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa wuzeɠe
Ta ti ɠaalɛ ba, ti pɛ zeɠei zu,
Alugi ɠaaɠaalɛi ga unfegi,
